entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind light except east 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait late this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind light except east 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 01 January 2023
